com.giisoo.core.bean

类 Bean.W

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giisoo.core.bean.Bean.W
  • 封闭类:
    Bean

    public static final class Bean.W
extends Object
    used to create SQL "where" conditions
    作者:
    joe

      copy the name and parameter from a JSON, with "and" and "op" conditions

      copy the value in jo, the format of name is: ["name", "table field name"]

      copy the name and int parameter from the JSON, with "and" and "op" conditions

      copy the value of jo, the format of name is: ["name", "table field name"]

      create a empty
